languages.text: "Застава блюстителей потеряна, на ней хозяйничают мутанты. Увы, путь на верхние палубы лежит либо через нее, либо через транспортные туннели, но там тоже засел враг".

"The enforcer post has been lost and is swarming with mutants. Alas, the only ways to the upper decks lie either through the post or through the transport tunnels, but there are enemies there as well."
languages.original_text: "Застава блюстителей потеряна, на ней хозяйничают мутанты. Увы, путь на верхние палубы лежит либо через нее, либо через транспортные туннели, но там тоже засел враг".

traits.locale_text: "The enforcer post has been lost and is swarming with mutants. Alas, the way to the upper decks lies either through it or through the transport tunnels, but there are enemies there as well."

languages.text: «El puesto de guardia ha caído y está lleno de mutantes. Por desgracia, las únicas formas de llegar a las cubiertas superiores son a través del puesto o por los túneles de transporte, donde también hay enemigos».
languages.original_text: "The enforcer post has been lost and is swarming with mutants. Alas, the only ways to the upper decks lie either through the post or through the transport tunnels, but there are enemies there as well."

traits.locale_text: «El puesto de guardia ha caído y está lleno de mutantes. Por desgracia, las únicas formas de llegar a las cubiertas superiores son a través del puesto o por los túneles de transporte, donde también hay enemigos».

languages.text: 「エンフォーサーの駐屯地が崩れて、変異体が押し寄せています。残念ですが、上層デッキに行くには駐屯地か輸送トンネルを通るしかないのですが、そこにも敵がはびこっています」
languages.original_text: "The enforcer post has been lost and is swarming with mutants. Alas, the only ways to the upper decks lie either through the post or through the transport tunnels, but there are enemies there as well."

traits.locale_text: 「エンフォーサーの駐屯地が崩れて、変異体が押し寄せています。残念ですが、上層デッキに行くには駐屯地か輸送トンネルを通るしかないのですが、そこにも敵がはびこっています」

languages.text: “执法者哨站已经沦陷，里面到处都是变种人。遗憾的是，通往上层甲板只有两条路，要么通过哨站，要么通过运输通道，但运输通道里也有敌人。”
languages.original_text: "The enforcer post has been lost and is swarming with mutants. Alas, the only ways to the upper decks lie either through the post or through the transport tunnels, but there are enemies there as well."

traits.locale_text: “执法者哨站已经沦陷，里面到处都是变种人。遗憾的是，通往上层甲板只有两条路，要么通过哨站，要么通过运输通道，但运输通道里也有敌人。”

languages.text: "Der Enforcer-Posten ist verloren, es wimmelt dort nur so von Mutanten. Man kommt jedoch nur auf zwei Wegen auf die Oberdecks: entweder durch den Posten oder durch die Transporttunnel, die aber auch von Feinden überlaufen sind."
languages.original_text: "The enforcer post has been lost and is swarming with mutants. Alas, the only ways to the upper decks lie either through the post or through the transport tunnels, but there are enemies there as well."

traits.locale_text: "Der Enforcer-Posten ist verloren, es wimmelt dort nur so von Mutanten. Man kommt jedoch nur auf zwei Wegen auf die Oberdecks: entweder durch den Posten oder durch die Transporttunnel, die aber auch von Feinden überlaufen sind."

languages.text: « Nous avons perdu le poste des prévôts, qui grouille désormais de mutants. Malheureusement, pour rejoindre les ponts supérieurs d'ici, on a que deux choix : passer par le poste des prévôts, justement, ou par les tunnels de transport, qui pullulent aussi d'ennemis. »
languages.original_text: "The enforcer post has been lost and is swarming with mutants. Alas, the only ways to the upper decks lie either through the post or through the transport tunnels, but there are enemies there as well."

traits.locale_text: « Nous avons perdu le poste des prévôts, qui grouille désormais de mutants. Malheureusement, pour rejoindre les ponts supérieurs d'ici, on a que deux choix : passer par le poste des prévôts, justement, ou par les tunnels de transport, qui pullulent aussi d'ennemis. »

languages.text: "İnfazcı mevkisini kaybettik, mutantlar orada cirit atıyor. Ne yazık ki üst güverteye giden iki yol var. Biri mevkiden, diğeri de nakliye tünellerinden geçiyor. Düşman orada da mevcut."
languages.original_text: "The enforcer post has been lost and is swarming with mutants. Alas, the only ways to the upper decks lie either through the post or through the transport tunnels, but there are enemies there as well."
